Posts.Content: 5babiesmommy wrote: Anyone else out there doing chemo before surgery..I have already had 4doses of taxol/herceptin will have 8 more of these wkly then 4doses of a/c 5fu every 3 wks for a total If another 12 wks..then my onco says I will be able to have my lumpectomy. I'm new to this and scared I'm also her 2+ which scares me even more,I'm really confused as to doing the lumpectomy vs mastectomy my docs say it's my decision but that their both equal when used w chemo..I am just scared that the cancer will come back if I don't have the mastectomy..anyone w similar story,would e greatly appreciated ,it's been 6 wks since I was diagnosed and I still can't shake the fear and anxiety and just get to a point where I feel positive that I will be ok..man I hope that comes soon!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Chemo before surgery 5babiesmommy PhotoGirlOH
